name: Last Soul
storyline:
The AI-wars threatened to end civilization as we know it.

Desperate to avoid the inevitable, a last-ditch initiative called “Cyber-Being” - an AI to save humanity - was activated.

Cyber-Being ruthlessly hunted down rogue AIs restoring order and bringing civilization back from the brink. This was called “The Purge”.

Humanity started an age of unprecedented prosperity, but after several decades without any motivation, humans are falling into vegetative states and dying prematurely. They are soulless.

No human has the will to stand against Cyber-Being. But not everything is lost… yet.
summary: "Last Soul" is a 2d pixel art action platformer with a compelling story about a future where mankind has lost its will. Explore and fight your way through a variety of levels, and take on awesome boss enemies.
